\documentclass[border=6pt]{standalone}

\usepackage{qcircuit}

\begin{document}

\Qcircuit @C=1em @R=0em {
& \multigate{3}{e^{-i t \sum_j c_j P_j} = \prod_j e^{-i t c_j P_j}} & \qw \\
& \ghost{e^{-i t \sum_j c_j P_j} = \prod_j e^{-i t c_j P_j}} & \qw \\
& \ghost{e^{-i t \sum_j c_j P_j} = \prod_j e^{-i t c_j P_j}} & \qw \\
& \ghost{e^{-i t \sum_j c_j P_j} = \prod_j e^{-i t c_j P_j}} & \qw
}

\end{document}
